thread.title: Handy Hotel in 6th Arrondissement
thread.title_full: Handy Hotel in 6th Arrondissement - Review of Hotel Atlantis Saint-Germain-des-Pres, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: daviddD2632SM
title: Handy Hotel in 6th Arrondissement
text: Reasonably priced, handily located, small hotel, 100 metres from Saint-Sulpice Metro station, just off Place Saint-Sulpice. About 20 minutes walk to Notre Dame. Our room was quite small (as were all the others I think), with en-suite bath and shower (hand-held and no curtain), to the rear of the hotel so it was very quiet. Tiny lift, with barely room for one person and a case! We took the stairs so quite tiring up to the 5th floor. Breakfast at €13 seemed expensive so we ate elsewhere (plenty of cafés etc. in the vicinity). Only reason not 5 stars is size of room and shower.
